page.title: 13PEOPLE GREENHALGH/ROSEACRE
page.content: Population in this area is low. The population of Thistleton, Esprick and Greenhalgh is 420 persons. Roseacre has 41 adults, 10 retired adults and 24 children. Elswick Grange has 4 adults and Elswick Leys has 15 adults; 4 retired adults and 3 children. White Carr has 5 adults and Medlar has 15 adults and retired people. Total 547 persons. Population trends in this area follow those for the Fylde. According to figures recently revealed in Lancashire County Council's planning bulletin the Flyde has a low birth rate and a high death rate explained by the high elderly population. About a quarter of Fylde's population is of pensionable age compared with a national average of less than 18%.
